mapper.select:
select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongName, h.jibun, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, h.lat, h.lng, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice, (select max(dealAmount) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode) as maxPrice, (select count(dealAmount) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode) as dealCount,
ifnull( h.aptCode in (select h.aptcode FROM interest_apart i, houseinfo h WHERE i.aptCode = h.aptCode AND i.user_id = #{userId} union select 0) , 0 ) as isUserInterest from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where 1 = 1
AND aptName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{aptKeyword}, '%')
AND left(dongCode,2) = #{sidoCode}
AND left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugunCode}
AND dongCode = #{dongCode}
ORDER BY
dealCount desc
h.buildYear desc
maxPrice desc
recentPrice desc
h.aptName
h.aptCode
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where aptCode = #{aptCode}

SELECT subway_id, line, station, sub.lat, sub.lng, LEFT((6371*acos(cos(radians( apt.lat ))*cos(radians( sub.lat) )*cos( radians( sub.lng ) -radians( apt.lng ))+sin(radians( apt.lat ))*sin( radians(sub.lat )))), 5) AS distance FROM subway sub, (SELECT lat, lng FROM houseinfo where aptCode = #{aptCode}) as apt WHERE (6371*acos( cos( radians( apt.lat )) * cos(radians( sub.lat )) * cos(radians( sub.lng ) -radians( apt.lng ))+sin( radians( apt.lat ))*sin( radians( sub.lat )))) <= 2
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM interest_apart WHERE user_id = #{userId} and aptCode = #{aptCode}
mapper.select: SELECT shop_code, name, branch_name, commercial_code, commercial_name, classification, dongcode, jibun1, jibun2, building, building_dong, floor, ho, lat, lng FROM shop s WHERE commercial_name = #{category} and (6371*acos( cos( radians( #{lat} )) * cos(radians( s.lat )) * cos(radians( s.lng ) -radians( #{lng} ))+sin( radians( #{lat} ))*sin( radians( s.lat )))) <= 0.5 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 50
